questions.question: 1901 - HE WAS BORN ON DECEMBER 5TH IN CHICAGO, IL.

questions.answer: What is Grand Prix Raceway (Tomorrowland Speedway)?
questions.question: 1971 - This tomorrowland attraction was already two years outdated when it opened in december.
1982 - THIS WAS THE ONLY FUTURE WORLD PAVILION to OPEN WITHOUT an operating ride.
1989 - THIS opening day attraction occupied the location now known as the HYPERION THEATER.
1995 - THIS CO-FOUNDER OF THE CREATIVE ARTISTS AGENCY (CAA) BECAME THE PRESIDENT OF THE WALT DISNEY COMPANY - BUT ONLY LASTED TWO YEARS UNTIL BOB IGER REPLACED HIM.
ZOOTOPIA; JASON BATEMAN.

questions.answer: What is the Captain American Adventure?
questions.question: A 45 MINUTE USO SHOW WITH STEVE ROGERS (NOT WILL), MARK TWAIN AND BEN FRANKLIN.

questions.answer: What is Treasure Planet of the Apes?
questions.question: YOU MANIACS! YOU TOOK THIS MOVIE BASED ON THE CLASSIC ROBERT LOUIS STEVENSON NOVEL AND YOU BLEW IT ALL UP! DARN YOU ALL TO HECK!
THE FIRST RULE OF THIS EXCLUSIVE DISNEY ORGANIZATION, IS THAT YOU DO NOT TALK ABOUT THIS EXCLUSIVE ORGANIZATION.

questions.answer: What is Festival of the Lion Kingsmen?
questions.question: THIS SHOW IN THE HARAMBE THEATER HAS COLIN FIRTH TEACHING YOU HOW TO BE A GENTLEMAN SPY.

questions.answer: What is Murder on the Orient Express Monorail?
questions.question: FAMOUS DETECTIVE HERCULE POIROT RIDES DIRECTLY FROM THE TTC TO THE MAGIC KINGDOM, BUT ONE TOURIST DOESN'T MAKE IT THERE ALIVE. MAYBE THEY WERE SHOVED OUT OF AN OPEN DOOR?

questions.answer: What is the Hoop Dee Doo Musical Revue?
questions.question: The first resort I ever stayed at in Walt Disney World was Fort Wilderness, which serves as home for this dinner show.
My favorite restaurant at Walt Disney World is The Wave, which is inside of this Magic Kingdom-area resort.
One of my favorite attractions at Walt Disney World, this actually came from Disneyland, where it was replaced by America Sings in 1974.

questions.answer: What is the TTA/Tomorrowland Transit Authority/WEDWay PeopleMover?
questions.question: This is one of my favorite attractions at Walt Disney World. A version of it used to exist out in Disneyland as well - but got replaced by Rocket Rods in 1998. (Yuck.)

questions.answer: What is the Year of a Million Dreams?
questions.question: I've been inside of the Cinderella Castle Suite - which is gorgeous, by the way. It was created as a part of this Disney promotion, which (contrary to its name) ran for a little over two years.

double-jeopardy.name: THE REST OF THE RECENT NEWS

questions.answer: What is The Hall of Presidents?
questions.question: QUASHING RUMORS THAT THIS ATTRACTION WOULDN'T RE-OPEN AFTER BEING CLOSED FOR NEARLY A YEAR, IT FINALLY REOPENED WITH LITTLE FANFARE ON DECEMBER 11TH.
QUASHING RUMORS THAT THIS RESTAURANT WOULDN'T OPEN AFTER BEING UNDER CONSTRUCTION FOR NEARLY A YEAR, IT FINALLY OPENED WITH LITTLE FANFARE ON DECEMBER 31ST.
BEGINNING WITH THE THREE MONORAIL RESORTS NEAR THE MAGIC KINGDOM, WALT DISNEY WORLD RESORT HOTELS WILL NO LONGER PROVIDE GUESTS WITH DOOR SIGNS SAYING THIS.
STARTING IN 2018, GUESTS STAYING AT this category OF NON-DISNEY-OWNED HOTELS WILL HAVE ADVANCED ACCESS TO FASTPASS+.
THIS STREETMOSPHERE ACTRESS PASSED AWAY IN DECEMBER - AFTER FINDING OUT, HER FELLOW CAST MEMBERS HAD A PIE EATING TRIBUTE ON SUNSET BOULEVARD.

double-jeopardy.name: LET'S JUST PUT FOX IN TGMR

questions.question: FOOTLIGHT PARADE? NOBODY EVEN KNOWS WHAT THAT IS ANYMORE. LET'S PUT IN THIS MATTHEW MORRISON AND JANE LYNCH TELEVISION SERIES - THAT'LL REALLY TAKE THIS RIDE IN NEW DIRECTIONS!
SURE MARY POPPINS IS A CLASSIC, BUT IT'S BORING - HOW ABOUT THIS ACTION FILM INSTEAD? LET'S REPLACE MARY FLOATING WITH HANS GRUBER FALLING FROM THE TOP OF NAKATOMI TOWER!
SURE, THE ALIEN SCENE HAS A GOOD FEEL TO IT, BUT THAT PROPERTY IS DEAD. HOW ABOUT WE PUT IN THIS 1996 WILL SMITH MOVIE INSTEAD? IT JUST GOT A SEQUEL IN 2016, SO IT MUST BE GOOD!

GIVEN OUR NEW ACQUISITIONS, WE CAN MERGE THE WESTERN AND SPACE SCENES TOGETHER, ALL USING ONE TELEVISION SHOW - THE FANBOYS WILL LOVE IT! BURN THE LAND AND BOIL THE SEA - YOU CAN'T TAKE THE SKY FROM ME!
THE GANGSTER SCENE IS TOO GRITTY FOR A DISNEY PARK - WE NEED TO LIGHTEN IT UP. LET'S PUT THIS CLASSIC JOE PESCI COURTROOM COMEDY IN INSTEAD - THE ONLY ANIMATRONICS WE'D NEED WOULD BE TWO "YUTES"!

final-jeopardy.category: so long and thanks for all the fish
final-jeopardy.question: The original Living Seas pavilion had you board Hydrolators that transported you to this fictional location.

questions.question: HE'S YOUR FRIEND WHO LIKES TO PLAY - HIS ROCKET MAKES YOU YELL "HOORAY!"
EARLIER THIS YEAR, A MARIACHI BAND IN MEXICO AT EPCOT SANG SONGS FROM THIS PIXAR MOVIE.
RUSSELL AND DUG FROM "UP" WILL BE REPLACING THIS SHOW IN THE CARAVAN THEATER LATER THIS YEAR.
CALIFORNIA SCREAMIN' at disney california adventure WILL BE TRANSFORMED FOR PIXAR PIER TO BECOME THIS.
I WANT MY BABYBEL, BABYBEL, BABYBEL... AND I'LL BE ABLE TO GET IT WHEN THIS TOY STORY LAND RESTAURANT OPENS.
HUGH JACKMAN MADE HIS FINAL APPEARANCE AS WOLVERINE IN THIS MOVIE.
HE IS DANNY RAND. PROTECTOR OF K'UN-LUN. SWORN ENEMY OF THE HAND.
THIS MUTANT HAS DESCRIBED HIMSELF AS LOOKING "LIKE A CROSS BETWEEN RYAN REYNOLDS AND A SHAR-PEI".

questions.answer: What is Ant Man and the Wasp?
questions.question: THIS IS THE FIRST MOVIE IN THE MCU COMING OUT AFTER AVENGERS: INFINITY WAR.
THIS HULU SERIES (BASED ON THE SUPERHERO TEAM OF THE SAME NAME) RECENTLY FINISHED ITS FIRST SEASON, AND WAS RENEWED FOR A SECOND.
TWO DIFFERENT CHARACTERS IN THE STAR WARS UNIVERSE SHARE THIS NAME: IN THE CLONE WARS, HE'S DESIGNATION NUMBER CT-7567; IN STAR TOURS, HE'S AN RX-24 DROID.
THIS JEDI HAS A CERTAIN SET OF SKILLS - HE WILL FIND YOU, AND HE WILL... GET KILLED BY DARTH MAUL. WHOOPS.
THIS IS THE NAME OF THE PLANET YOU'LL BE VISITING IN STAR WARS: GALAXY'S EDGE.
THIS MEMBER OF THE JEDI COUNCIL LOOKS KIND OF LIKE A GREEN SQUID.
THIS NEW DROID FIRST APPEARED IN THE LAST JEDI.
THIS CLASS OF STARFIGHTER IS THE PRIMARY SHIP USED BY THE REBEL ALLIANCE.
ALONG WITH TWIN PEAKS, THIS SHOW WAS PART OF THE INSPIRATION FOR GRAVITY FALLS. THE TRUTH IS OUT THERE!

questions.answer: Who is X Atencio? (Francis Xavier Atencio)
questions.question: HE IS MOST WELL KNOWN FOR HELPING WRITE YO HO AND GRIM GRINNING GHOSTS - AND BELIEVE IT OR NOT, HIS FIRST NAME IS ACTUALLY FRANCIS.
THIS FICTIONAL ALIEN CORPORATION IS MOST WELL KNOWN FOR THEIR TELEPORTER TECHNOLOGY - ALTHOUGH I WOULDN'T EXACTLY SAY THEY HAVE A GOOD REPUTATION...

questions.answer: What is the X-2 Deep Space Shuttle?
questions.question: THIS IS THE NAME OF YOUR CRAFT IN BOTH VERSIONS OF MISSION: SPACE; IT'S CAPABLE OF GOING FROM 0 TO 6,000 IN 60 SECONDS, SO WHEN YOU HEAR THE WORDS "GO FOR LAUNCH", YOU'LL PROBABLY WANT TO HANG ON.

questions.answer: What is Honey I Shrunk The Audience?
What is Pirates of the Caribbean?

questions.question: ORIGINALLY THE ONLY LICENSED PROPERTY IN ANIMAL KINGDOM, IT IS NOW OWNED BY DISNEY.
BACK IN 1996, THE DISNEY COMPANY ACQUIRED ABC, WHICH INCLUDED AN 80% STAKE IN THIS SPORTS NETWORK. (ONE OF THEIR SHOWS ENDED UP BEING THE INSPIRATION FOR AROUND THE HUB!)
ON JUNE 13, 2017, WDWNT REPORTED THAT DISNEY BOUGHT OUT ENOUGH OWNERSHIP STOCK TO CONTROL THIS LOCATION.
THESE COLORFUL CHARACTERS ONCE APPEARED ON THE STREETS OF AMERICA IN DISNEY'S HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS. MAYBE THEY'LL MAKE A RETURN NOW THAT DISNEY OWNS THEM AGAIN?
ON AUGUST 8, 2017, DISNEY ANNOUNCED IT PURCHASED THE MAJORITY STAKE IN THIS DIGITAL MEDIA COMPANY SPUN OFF FROM MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL.
